issue.title: [CF 203] Request: Chat Bubbles
issue.body:
Posting this ticket here, as opposed to curse.com at your request... Pretty self explanatory, but essentially an option to have a chat bubble pop up as a response to a buff/debuff/event/etc. It's the standard "I'm the bomb" type of response, without the need for memory intensive boss mods.

I hope you don't let the brevity of this ticket detract from its importance. I truly think this is an excellent change for the addon and I was really surprised it wasn't implemented before you bumped in the sound list.

In any case, "Love the addon" I always tell everyone that if you could only raid with one addon, that this is the one to take.


> Posted by CurseForge user booi | Imported from CurseForge issue #203 | Raw
